page.title: 07LOCALS ATTITUDES TO FOREST
page.content: Sixty-eight people living in the Upshire area were questioned about their views on Epping Forest.The forest is very popular,it was the most favourite place in the area. Epping Forest is used quite regularly by the people in Upshire.It is used on average several times a week by each person.The main reason for using the forest is for walking. Other activities people enjoy doing in the forest are Jogging,Horse-Riding Berry picking,Gliding,Picnics,Cycling and Orienteering. The local people also gave us their opinions on current problems facing the forest.These included litter,dumping of cars,pollution from traffic,vandalism, motorbikes,horse-riding and lack of parking space.
